about_the_game:
Step into the world of Conradito Cafézito, an incremental and idle game with a coffee theme where every click counts! Manage your café in a colorful 2D pixelated environment, raking in money through automatic coffee production and optimizing every step of your business. Automate tasks, hire employees, improve recipes, and open new branches to speed up your growth and maximize profits.

With click mechanics, minigames, and the ability to expand your barista empire, Conradito Cafézito blends casual time-management strategy with fun economic depth. Perfect for those who love seeing numbers rise as they upgrade their café with every new investment!

Game Features

In this world of coffee beans, you can unlock:

  • 36 authentic recipes from the real world

  • 8 different ingredients

Who knows, it might even inspire new creations in the real world?

And you can speed up your growth and production process with:

  • 35 improvements and machinery

  • Separated into 7 real-world production concepts

Everything to speed up your production process and turn your coffee shop into a real money-making machine.

And you won't just enjoy "idling" while the money rolls in, unlike standard idle game experiences, as you have

  • 9 expansions that modify the gameplay and boost your growth

  • 7 dynamic minigames that provide bonuses

  • Rebirth factor of the game with the "New Roast" mode that allows you to restart the game with exclusive bonuses

Now, grab your "cafézito", because it's time to make the magic happen at Conradito Cafézito!

name: Conradito Cafézito

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or x86-compatible processor with 2.33GHz or faster
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Not applicable
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Not applicable
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not applicable
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Not applicable

reviews:
“this game is amazing and perfect, congratulations!”
10 – My Mom
short_description: It costs the price of a coffee – but it lasts much longer! Conradito Cafézito, is an idle and incremental game where you unlock recipes, automate processes, and expand your coffee empire while watching your profits rise with every click!
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian, German
